author: Staff Reporter
text:
A petition has been filed with the Madurai City Police alleging unnecessary harassment by a policeman attached to Special Investigation Cell (SIC) of the Directorate of Vigilance and Anti-Corruption (DVAC).

The policeman, identified as Gnanasekar, along with a few other accomplices, was allegedly threatening some of the business enterprises, mainly hotels, in S.S Colony police limits with the intention of extorting money. One of the aggrieved businessmen had lodged a complaint with the S.S. Colony police following which the police have begun inquiries. However, a case is yet to be registered.
title: Petition against policeman
